name: Death Is Only The Beginning (pixelook)
description:
The game was built for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

The theme was: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

How to play:

  • search for the lost souls
  • take them to the portal
  • avoid the Fenix
  • you can kill Fenix but the death is only the beginning for the two new Fenixes

Controls:

  • WSAD + mouse to move
  • SPACE + mouse click to fire

For this game jam, I've decided to go with a lot of new stuff.
Maze is randomly generated, for the first time I've used Unity3D NavMesh, for the first time I've used Blender animation.
For sure, this is not the best idea as it means you are just fighting with a lot of new problems.
